sen.j: 石川 昌能（いしかわ まさよし、万治元年（1658年） - 天和 (日本)2年4月25日 (旧暦)（1682年6月1日））は、山城国淀藩の世嗣。
sen.e: Masayoshi ISHIKAWA (born 1658, died April 25, 1682 (old lunar calendar) (June 1, 1682)) was a successor of Yodo domain of the Province of Yamashiro.
Masayoshi ISHIKAWA (born 1658, died April 25, 1682 (old lunar calendar) (June 1, 1682)) was a successor of Yodo domain of the Province of Yamashiro.
Masayoshi ISHIKAWA (1658 - June 1, 1682) was a successor of Yodo domain of the Province of Yamashiro.
sen.cmt: 旧暦削除して、表記変更

sen.e: He was born as the first son of Noriyuki ISHIKAWA.
He was born as the first son of Noriyuki ISHIKAWA.
He was born as the first son of Noriyuki ISHIKAWA.
His lawful wife was a daughter of Takatsugu TODO.
His lawful wife was a daughter of Takatsugu TODO.
His lawful wife was a daughter of Takatsugu TODO.

sen.j: 子に石川勝之（長男）、娘（石川総茂正室）。
sen.e: His children included Katsuyuki ISHIKAWA (first son) and a daughter (who later became the lawful wife of Fusashige ISHIKAWA).
His children included Katsuyuki ISHIKAWA (first son) and a daughter (who later became the lawful wife of Fusashige ISHIKAWA).
His children included Katsuyuki ISHIKAWA (first son) and a daughter (who later became the lawful wife of Fusashige ISHIKAWA).

sen.j: 官位は従五位下、日向国守。
sen.e: His official court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) and Governor of Hyuga Province.
His official court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) and Governor of Hyuga Province.
His official court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) and Governor of Hyuga Province.

sen.j: 伊勢亀山藩（のち山城淀藩）の嫡子として生まれる。
sen.e: He was born as the legitimate child of the domain of Ise-kameyama (that later became the domain of Yamashiro-Yodo).
He was born as the legitimate child of the domain of Ise-kameyama (that later became the domain of Yamashiro-Yodo).
He was born as the legitimate child of the domain of Ise-kameyama (that later became the Yodo domain of the Yamashiro Province).

sen.j: 寛文8年（1668年）徳川家綱に拝謁し、寛文11年（1671年）に叙任した。
sen.e: He was granted an audience with Ietsuna TOKUGAWA in 1668, and was investitured in 1671.
He was granted an audience with Ietsuna TOKUGAWA in 1668, and was investitured in 1671.
He was granted an audience with Ietsuna TOKUGAWA in 1668, and was investitured in 1671.

sen.j: しかし家督相続前の天和2年（1682年）に25歳で早世。
sen.e: He died early at age 25 in 1682, before he succeeded to the family.
He died early at age 25 in 1682, before he was able to succeed the family.
He died early at age 25 in 1682, before he was able to succeed the family.

sen.j: 代わって長男の勝之が嫡子となった。
sen.e: Therefore, his first son, Katsuyuki, became the heir.
Therefore, his first son, Katsuyuki, became the heir.
Therefore, his first son, Katsuyuki, became the heir.
